message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. I'm confident we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.
I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product, considering its value to me. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the price you're looking for.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still aiming for a price closer to my initial offer. I'm willing to come down to $900,000. This reflects the value of the product to you while still ensuring I receive a fair price.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to me and your initial offer.
